alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Lawrence County through 1215 AM EDT... At 1144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rensselaer Falls, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canton, De Kalb, Colton, Rensselaer Falls, Morley, Heuvelton, Pierrepont, De Peyster, Pyrites, North Russell, De Kalb Junction, South Colton and West Pierrepont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
